data.message: This could be the good example for social network being the key to solve global problem now and then! Very impressive and brilliant! I will do what I could do!!

replies.message: Thank you Shine! Any support you can give to raise awareness for this cause will help greatly. -Elissa
I've donated tiny amount of money to Save the children via Facebook!! So rewarding~
Thanks for your support, Shine! Your gift will help the heroes on the front lines continue their life-saving work. -Jenny
Thanks for offering this page so many can thinks and just click in to donate 👍👍👍👍
Now. If facebook would just stop spamming its users into donating when they are a 190 billion dollar a year company...
I think it's admirable but what about feeding and educating our own impoverished nation?

You may not credibly threaten others, or organize acts of real-world violence. Organizations with a record of terrorist or violent criminal activity are not allowed to maintain a presence on our site. We also prohibit promoting, planning or celebrating any of your actions if they have, or could, result in financial harm to others, including theft and vandalism. but you leave a page called death to israel that incourages terror
i reported it 100 times still you leave it what dose death to israel mean to you ?
Facebook how come i can't see who's following me? :)
